Text: What the fuck? DON'T DL, this torrent does NOT contain the movie described.  It's a bunch of random videos, pics and music. What is wrong with people?

@mrorbear You're an idiot.

The aforementioned video in the title is there, I checked the list of files when the torrent opened in utorrent, as for the other .torrent files, it's not uncommon for UL'ers to include other torrents in the downloads. It's a form of advertising. Get over it or stfu.
